revised_title: Advances in Electrostatic Precipitators for Air Pollution Control
tldr: This article discusses recent advancements in electrostatic precipitators for dust removal, focusing on their design, efficiency, and applications in industries such as cement, electricity, and iron and steel. The authors explore the theories behind the precipitation process, design assessments, and plant developments, as well as the challenges posed by high dust resistivity in British power stations.
